name: RandomFacts
0:
”Alexa, open random facts”
”Alexa, start random facts”
”Alexa, random facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random facts
des: Random Facts by Forward Vibe is designed to give you, the user, a wide array of random facts in various fields. Do you ever have the urge to learn something new, and fast? But you don't know what you want to learn? Learn a random fact with Random Facts! Some facts will make you laugh. Others will make you cry. Some will make you uncomfortable. Are you ready?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
